awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.

fullplot: A somewhat daffy book editor on a rail trip from Los Angeles to Chicago thinks that he sees a murdered man thrown from the train. When he can find no one who will believe him, he starts doing some investigating of his own. But all that accomplishes is to get the killer after him.
plot: On a long-distance train trip, a man finds romance but also finds himself in danger of being killed, or at least pushed off the train.
title: Silver Streak
